name: whatson-api
description: What's on? API to retrieve movies and tv shows

scripts.push: npm run prettier && npm run test && git add . && git cz && git push origin main && git push bitbucket main && git push bitbucket_2 main && git push bitbucket_3 main
scripts.update-movie-data-first-half: node -e "const day = (new Date()).getDate() <= 15 ? (new Date()).getDate() : null; if(day != null) {const index = parseInt(process.env.CIRCLE_NODE_INDEX) + 1; console.log((day - 1) * 1500 + (index * 300));}" | xargs -I {} node data/updateData.js movie no_update_ids update_db no_local no_active no_check {} no_skip
scripts.update-movie-data-second-half: node -e "const day = (new Date()).getDate() > 15 ? (new Date()).getDate() : null; if(day != null) {const index = parseInt(process.env.CIRCLE_NODE_INDEX) + 1; console.log((day - 1) * 1500 + (index * 300));}" | xargs -I {} node data/updateData.js movie no_update_ids update_db no_local no_active no_check {} no_skip
scripts.update-tvshow-data-all: node -e "const day = (new Date()).getDate() <= 15 ? (new Date()).getDate() : null; if(day != null) {const index = parseInt(process.env.CIRCLE_NODE_INDEX) + 1; console.log((day - 1) * 1500 + (index * 300));}" | xargs -I {} node data/updateData.js tvshow no_update_ids update_db no_local no_active no_check {} no_skip

author: Pierre Vanoverschelde
